li.a: Community Eligibility Provision (CEP) FY19-20 – Spanish Version
IAA Board April 2020 Board Meeting Click Here

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_custom_1561488470500 wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bounceInRight bounceInRight vc_separator-has-text

img.alt: Ignite Achievement Academy charter school indianapolis

p.strong: Please be vigilant and help us reduce the transmission of infectious illnesses at school:
p.br:
• Look for signs of any illness in your scholar
• Keep your scholar at home if they are ill or have a fever
• If your scholar becomes ill or develops a fever at school,
pick them up immediately after being notified
• If anyone in your household becomes ill or develops a fever,
seek medical advice from your primary healthcare provider

p.strong:
Por favor, esté atento y ayúdenos a reducir
la transmisión de enfermedades infecciosas en la escuela:
p.br:
• Busque signos de cualquier enfermedad en su erudito
• Mantenga a su erudito en casa si está enfermo o tiene fiebre
• Si su erudito se enferma o desarrolla fiebre en la escuela,
recójalos inmediatamente después de ser notificado
• Si alguien en su hogar se enferma o tiene fiebre,
busque consejo médico de su proveedor de atención médica primaria

a.h2:
Popcorn money is due on Thursdays.
Help support the PTO!

img.div: Please call 317-226-4242 for more information. Summer office hours from 9 AM to 4PM

div.h4: When asked what they loved about Ignite, here is what our parents had to say....

div.p: I love the atmosphere. My son has nothing but positive things to say.
It is a good school. The staff actually cares
I love that my daughter loves this school and has made a lot of friends.
They help and allow the children to be themselves while learning more about our culture.

The mission of IAA is to provide the community with an accelerated learning institution that propels scholars academically by utilizing a holistic curriculum built upon cultural and community responsiveness, project-based learning and the leading literacy, socio-emotional, and neuroscientific research; thus providing scholars rich opportunities for enrichment, achievement, and increasing degrees of impact in every field of endeavor.

ul.li:

at Elder Diggs
1002 W 25th St.
Indianapolis, IN 46208
